data.speaker: Player
data.content: (I slash at the painting. A frenzy of cheers sounds in my head from the other paintings.)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (The four remaining paintings cackle as I hear the dying sounds of the sacrifice.)

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (I think... I think I did the right thing here...)
You feeling ok? I guess you really didn't like that painting!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: You... Look, what the hell is your problem? One second you're telling me to sacrifice paintings, the next...
Take it easy... Typical Liv, always lashing out at situations she can't control...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I DON'T EVEN KNOW YOU! Whatever, I'm gonna find a way out of here...
